verses.verse: וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char, And afterward בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u went in מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and told אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> par-'Oh; Pharaoh כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> shal-Lach go אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> 'am-Mi, Let my people וְיָחֹ֥גּוּ <WH2287> ve-ya-Chog-gu that they may hold a feast לִ֖י li בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar. unto me in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh מִ֤י <WH4310> mi Who יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh Who [is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher i אֶשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> 'esh-Ma' that I should obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> be-ko-Lo, his voice לְשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> le-shal-Lach go אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; to let Israel לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti ;I know אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, not the LORD וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> ve-Gam and besides אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El neither will I let Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo I will not אֲשַׁלֵּֽחַ׃ <WH7971> 'a-shal-Le-ach. go

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And they said אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei The God הָעִבְרִ֖ים <WH5680> ha-'iv-Rim of the Hebrews נִקְרָ֣א <WH7122> nik-Ra hath met עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu; and נֵ֣לֲכָה <WH1980> Ne-la-chah go נָּ֡א <WH4994> na Please דֶּרֶךְ֩ <WH1870> de-reCh journey שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet we pray thee three יָמִ֜ים <WH3117> ya-Mim days' בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar, into the desert וְנִזְבְּחָה֙ <WH2076> ve-niz-be-Chah and sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God פֶּ֨ן־ <WH6435> Pen- otherwise יִפְגָּעֵ֔נוּ <WH6293> yif-ga-'E-nu, lest he fall בַּדֶּ֖בֶר <WH1698> bad-De-ver upon us with pestilence א֥וֹ <WH176> o or בֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> ve-Cha-rev. or with the sword

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem But מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah why מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto them Wherefore do ye Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron תַּפְרִ֥יעוּ <WH6544> taf-Ri-'u let אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people מִמַּֽעֲשָׂ֑יו <WH4639> mi-ma-'a-Sav; act לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> le-Chu to לְסִבְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5450> le-siv-lo-tei-Chem. you unto your burdens

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh הֵן־ <WH2005> hen- Look רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> rab-Bim now [are] many עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah are now עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am Behold the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְהִשְׁבַּתֶּ֥ם <WH7673> ve-hish-bat-Tem and ye make them rest אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam מִסִּבְלֹתָֽם׃ <WH5450> mis-siv-lo-Tam. from their burdens

וַיְצַ֥ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav commanded פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh And Pharaoh בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom the same day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu; the same אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנֹּגְשִׂ֣ים <WH5065> han-no-ge-Sim the taskmasters בָּעָ֔ם <WH5971> ba-'Am, of the people וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שֹׁטְרָ֖יו <WH7860> sho-te-Rav and their officers לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo are no תֹאסִפ֞וּן <WH3254> to-si-Fun Ye shall no more לָתֵ֨ת <WH5414> la-Tet give תֶּ֧בֶן <WH8401> Te-ven straw לָעָ֛ם <WH5971> la-'Am the people לִלְבֹּ֥ן <WH3835> lil-Bon to make הַלְּבֵנִ֖ים <WH3843> hal-le-ve-Nim brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <WH8543> kit-Mol before שִׁלְשֹׁ֑ם <WH8032> shil-Shom; before that time הֵ֚ם <WH1992> hem themselves יֵֽלְכ֔וּ <WH1980> ye-le-Chu, go וְקֹשְׁשׁ֥וּ <WH7197> ve-ko-she-Shu and gather לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem תֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> Te-ven. straw

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַתְכֹּ֨נֶת <WH4971> mat-Ko-net And the tale הַלְּבֵנִ֜ים <WH3843> hal-le-ve-Nim of the bricks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֵם֩ <WH1992> hem they עֹשִׂ֨ים <WH6213> 'o-Sim which they did make תְּמ֤וֹל <WH8543> te-Mol before שִׁלְשֹׁם֙ <WH8032> shil-Shom before that time תָּשִׂ֣ימוּ <WH7760> ta-Si-mu ye shall lay עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, and לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo are not תִגְרְע֖וּ <WH1639> tig-re-'U upon them ye shall not diminish מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu; any כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because נִרְפִּ֣ים <WH7503> nir-Pim [ought] thereof for they [be] idle הֵ֔ם <WH1992> Hem, like עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> Ken, after that הֵ֤ם <WH1992> hem they צֹֽעֲקִים֙ <WH6817> tzo-'a-Kim therefore they cry לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying נֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> ne-le-Chah go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <WH2076> niz-be-Chah [and] sacrifice לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> le-lo-Hei-nu. to our God

תִּכְבַּ֧ד <WH3513> tich-Bad be laid הָעֲבֹדָ֛ה <WH5656> ha-'a-vo-Dah Let there more work עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim the men וְיַעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> ve-ya-'a-su- that they may labour בָ֑הּ Vah; וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- no יִשְׁע֖וּ <WH8159> yish-'U therein and let them not regard בְּדִבְרֵי־ <WH1697> be-div-rei- words שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> Sha-ker. vain

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <WH3318> vai-Ye-tze-'U went out נֹגְשֵׂ֤י <WH5065> no-ge-Sei And the taskmasters הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people וְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <WH7860> ve-Sho-te-Rav, and their officers וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and they spake אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am to the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, Pharaoh אֵינֶ֛נִּי <WH369> 'ei-Nen-ni I am not נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten I will not give לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem תֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> Te-ven. you straw

אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> 'at-Tem, You לְכ֨וּ <WH1980> le-Chu go קְח֤וּ <WH3947> ke-Chu ye get לָכֶם֙ la-Chem תֶּ֔בֶן <WH8401> Te-ven, you straw מֵאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> me-'a-Sher where תִּמְצָ֑אוּ <WH4672> tim-Tza-'u; ye can find כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki it yet אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein none נִגְרָ֛ע <WH1639> nig-Ra' shall be diminished מֵעֲבֹדַתְכֶ֖ם <WH5656> me-'a-vo-dat-Chem of your work דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> da-Var. not ought

וַיָּ֥פֶץ <WH6327> vai-Ya-fetz were scattered abroad הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am So the people בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz throughout all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt לְקֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH7197> le-ko-Shesh to gather קַ֖שׁ <WH7179> kash stubble לַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> lat-Te-ven. instead of straw

וְהַנֹּגְשִׂ֖ים <WH5065> ve-han-no-ge-Sim And the taskmasters אָצִ֣ים <WH213> 'a-Tzim hasted לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; [them] saying כַּלּ֤וּ <WH3615> kal-Lu Fulfil מַעֲשֵׂיכֶם֙ <WH4639> ma-'a-sei-Chem your works דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- tasks י֣וֹם <WH3117> Yom [your] daily בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <WH3117> be-yo-Mo, daily כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher you בִּהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> bih-Yot as when there was הַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> hat-Te-ven. straw

וַיֻּכּ֗וּ <WH5221> vai-yuk-Ku, over them were beaten שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <WH7860> sho-te-Rei And the officers בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom שָׂ֣מוּ <WH7760> Sa-mu had set עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-le-Hem, over נֹגְשֵׂ֥י <WH5065> no-ge-Sei taskmasters פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> far-'Oh which Pharaoh's לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; [and] demanded מַדּ֡וּעַ <WH4069> mad-Du-a' Why לֹא֩ <WH3808> lo not כִלִּיתֶ֨ם <WH3615> chil-li-Tem Wherefore have ye not fulfilled חָקְכֶ֤ם <WH2706> cha-ke-Chem your task לִלְבֹּן֙ <WH3835> lil-Bon in making brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <WH8543> kit-Mol both yesterday שִׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <WH8032> shil-Shom, before that time גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- either תְּמ֖וֹל <WH8543> te-Mol yesterday גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- or הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. and to day

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u, came שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <WH7860> sho-te-Rei Then the officers בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <WH6817> vai-yitz-'a-Ku and cried אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh unto Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying לָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why תַעֲשֶׂ֦ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh Wherefore dealest כֹ֖ה <WH3541> choh this לַעֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5650> la-'a-va-Dei-cha. bondage

תֶּ֗בֶן <WH8401> Te-ven, There is no straw אֵ֤ין <WH369> 'ein There נִתָּן֙ <WH5414> nit-Tan given לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> la-'a-va-Dei-cha, unto thy servants וּלְבֵנִ֛ים <WH3843> u-le-ve-Nim brick אֹמְרִ֥ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim and they say לָ֖נוּ La-nu עֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su; to us Make וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold עֲבָדֶ֛יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha and behold thy servants מֻכִּ֖ים <WH5221> muk-Kim [are] beaten וְחָטָ֥את <WH2398> ve-cha-Tat but the fault עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha. [is] in thine own people

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer But he said נִרְפִּ֥ים <WH7503> nir-Pim Ye [are] idle אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you נִרְפִּ֑ים <WH7503> nir-Pim; [ye are] idle עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> ken after that אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim, therefore ye say נֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> ne-le-Chah go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <WH2076> niz-be-Chah [and] do sacrifice לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. to the LORD

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> le-Chu go עִבְד֔וּ <WH5647> 'iv-Du, therefore now [and] work וְתֶ֖בֶן <WH8401> ve-Te-ven for there shall no straw לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no יִנָּתֵ֣ן <WH5414> yin-na-Ten be given לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וְתֹ֥כֶן <WH8506> ve-To-chen the tale לְבֵנִ֖ים <WH3843> le-ve-Nim of bricks תִּתֵּֽנּוּ׃ <WH5414> tit-Ten-nu. you yet shall ye deliver

וַיִּרְא֞וּ <WH7200> vai-yir-'U did see שֹֽׁטְרֵ֧י <WH7860> sho-te-Rei And the officers בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בְּרָ֣ע <WH7451> be-Ra' [that] they [were] in evil לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; [case] after it was said לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- must not תִגְרְע֥וּ <WH1639> tig-re-'U Ye shall not minish מִלִּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH3843> mil-liv-nei-Chem [ought] from your bricks דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- task י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom daily בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> be-yo-Mo. daily

וַֽיִּפְגְּעוּ֙ <WH6293> vai-yif-ge-'U And they met אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron נִצָּבִ֖ים <WH5324> nitz-tza-Vim who stood לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <WH7125> lik-ra-Tam; in the way בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> be-tze-Tam as they came forth מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> me-'Et פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> par-'Oh. from Pharaoh

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, about יֵ֧רֶא <WH7200> Ye-re look יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto them The LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem upon וְיִשְׁפֹּ֑ט <WH8199> ve-yish-Pot; upon you and judge אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to be הִבְאַשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH887> hiv-'ash-Tem to be abhorred אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֵיחֵ֗נוּ <WH7381> rei-Che-nu, because ye have made our savour בְּעֵינֵ֤י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the eyes פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> far-'Oh of Pharaoh וּבְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> u-ve-'ei-Nei and in the eyes עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav, of his servants לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> la-tet- to put חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev a sword בְּיָדָ֖ם <WH3027> be-ya-Dam in their hand לְהָרְגֵֽנוּ׃ <WH2026> le-ha-re-Ge-nu. to slay

וַיָּ֧שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov returned מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; and said אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai, Lord לָמָ֤ה <WH4100> la-Mah why הֲרֵעֹ֙תָה֙ <WH7489> ha-re-'O-tah wherefore hast thou [so] evil entreated לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> la-'Am folk הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, to this לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah why זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> zeh ever שְׁלַחְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH7971> she-lach-Ta-ni. send

וּמֵאָ֞ז <WH227> u-me-'Az for בָּ֤אתִי <WH935> Ba-ti For since I came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> par-'Oh to Pharaoh לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> le-dab-Ber to speak בִּשְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> bish-Me-cha, in thy name הֵרַ֖ע <WH7489> he-Ra' he hath done evil לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> la-'Am to this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; to this וְהַצֵּ֥ל <WH5337> ve-hatz-Tzel neither hast thou delivered לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- at הִצַּ֖לְתָּ <WH5337> hitz-Tzal-ta at all אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha. thy people
